content:
Prime Minister Denis Schmigal discussed David Kemeron's Foreign Minister, which will force Russia to pay for crimes and destruction.

About it the head of governmentreported March 26.

“They raised the creation of a special international group with the participation of Ukraine, which will develop the legal pathways necessary for confiscation. Ukraine has already submitted its proposals. The International Damage Register has been created, ”Denis Shmigal said.

According to him, it is proposed to create an International Compensation Commission and the Compensation Fund.

"Our position is unambiguous: all the frozen assets of Russia should be directed to the needs of our country," Denis Shmigal said.

Asreported the armyinform, air defense systems and drones are included in the next UK assistance package to Ukraine.
title: Denis Shmigal: Ukraine has already provided its proposals for confiscation
description: The head of government reported this on March 26. “They raised the question of creating a special ...
author: Army Inform
